# IS415 Project: FloSG - Spatial Interaction Models
By Group 1: [Genice Goh](https://www.linkedin.com/in/genice-goh/), [Nor Aisyah](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nor-aisyah/) and [Wong Wei Ling](https://www.linkedin.com/in/wei-ling-wong-a84130131/)

This project is a geospatial analytics project which will create a Shiny application to assist users with Spatial Interaction Models.

The links you want to check out:

1. [Project Web page](https://flosg-is415.netlify.app/)

The web page contains everything about our project including our poster, user guide and research paper.

2. [Project R Shiny application](https://flosg-is415.shinyapps.io/flosg/)

The R Shiny application allows user to upload their own datasets and utilize our geospatial analysis of Spatial Interaction Models on their own datasets.

3. [Project Practice Research Paper](https://github.com/geniceee/IS415_G1T1_Project/blob/master/PracticeResearchPaper/PracticeResearchPaper.pdf)

4. [User Guide](https://flosg-is415.shinyapps.io/flosg/)
